item.hollowengine.target_selector.hc_des: RMC: add target. SHIFT + RMC: clear target list.
hollowengine.npc_need: All you have to do is bring in:
hollowengine.no_permissions: You don't have enough permissions for this action!
hollowengine.no_text_dialogue: There should be text here, but it wasn't written in the script...
hollowengine.npc_creation.despawn: Can despawn NPC on peaceful mode?
hollowengine.npc_choicer.hollowcore: Adds models with skeleton animations. Supported formats:
hollowengine.npc_choicer.timecore: Adds models from BlockBench, including animated. Supported formats:
hollowengine.npc_choicer.vanilla: Adds models that other mobs in the game already have, so far only vanilla ones.
storyarchitect.progress_manager.no_tasks: No tasks yet, maybe they will appear later!
error.hollowengine.no_permission: You don't have permissions to edit scripts!
nodes.hollowengine.general.start.desc:
The entry point of your script, from which it runs.
There can be several of them.
nodes.hollowengine.general.end.desc:
Script termination point.
There can be several of them.
When at least one such node is reached, the script stops.
nodes.hollowengine.general.condition.des:
Selects one of two forks depending on the condition.
True - upper node | False - lower node
nodes.hollowengine.npcs.move_to.desc:
Gives the character a new task - to come to the specified coordinates.
The character moves to the next node, when the npc approaches the target at the specified distance.
Coordinates can change dynamically.
nodes.hollowengine.npcs.look_at.desc: Gives the character a new task to look at the specified coordinates.
nodes.hollowengine.npcs.say.desc: Displays a message in chat on behalf of the npcs.
Starts the specified animation of the model.
Layers:
  Additive - stacks with other animations.
  Overwrite - overwrites other animations.
Modes:
  Single - plays 1 time.
  Cyclic - played endlessly starting over.
  Last frame - played endlessly stopping at the last frame.
  Reverse - played endlessly, either in forward or reverse order.
nodes.hollowengine.npcs.interact.desc: Waits for the player to right-click on the character.
nodes.hollowengine.npcs.throw_item.desc: Drops the indicated item in the direction he is looking.
nodes.hollowengine.npcs.cause: NPC "%s" cause with error in script! Script stopped, view more info in logs.
nodes.hollowengine.server.command.desc: Runs the specified command on behalf of the server.
nodes.hollowengine.server.player_by_nick:
Gives out the player whose nickname you specify.
If the player is not on the server, it will generate an error.
nodes.hollowengine.server.nearest_player: Gives out the player who is closest to the current character.
nodes.hollowengine.server.player_info.de:
Outputs player data:
  Coordinates in the world
  Eye coordinates in the world (e.g. so that the character looks at your eyes instead of your feet)
  Player Nick
  Player Health
nodes.hollowengine.server.message.desc: Outputs the specified message to the chat room.
nodes.hollowengine.dialogues.name: Name
nodes.hollowengine.waiters.wait.desc: Waits for the specified number of ticks, then moves on to the next node.
pins.hollowengine.name: Name
codeEditor.hollowengine.optifine.warning: Warning, HollowEngine is not compatible with OptiFine, we recommend using Embeddium and Oculus mods instead!
codeEditor.hollowengine.inNewVersion: It's complicated; I'll do it later :)
